p: Internal validation statistics of all models were highâ€”for CL mean AUCs were 0.82 or higher ( Table 4a) and the mean correlations were 0.56 or higher. For VL, mean AUC were 0.85 or higher and the mean correlations were 0.63 or higher ( Table 4b). Predicted relative probability of presence from models with abiotic predictors showed significant positive correlations with independent municipality level data on the prevalence of CL and VL (CL: r = 0.214, p<0.0001; VL: r = 0.217, p<0.0001).
